dmca.title: Google DMCA - Vegetarianusa
dmca.body:
To:
Google, Inc.
Attn: Google Legal Support, DMCA Complaints
1600 Amphitheatre Parkway
Mountain View, CA 94043

From:
Peter Firk
The Vegetarian Travel Guide
5904 SE 229th Terrace
Hawthorne, FL 32640
(352) 481-0500
Website: http://www.vegetarianusa.com
E-mail: peter@vegetarianusa.com

To whom it may concern,

My site, VegetarianUSA.com - The Vegetarian Travel Guide, has been cloned (usually 80-100% identical) by a number of impostors over the past five years. VegetarianUSA.com is quite popular amongst natural health websites, and has received approx. 500,000 visitors each year since 2000. One of them is currently available on the Google search engine. It is called www.gototour.com.

You can see examples of the a few of the over 150 web pages that are being cloned here:

Original page: http://www.vegetarianusa.com/city/California.html
Gototour.com clone:http://www.gototour.com/city/California.html

Original page: http://www.vegetarianusa.com/city/Florida.html
Gototour.com clone: http://www.gototour.com/city/Florida.html

Original page: http://www.vegetarianusa.com/vacationmapaz.html
Gototour.com clone: http://www.gototour.com/vacationmapaz.html

As more proof of me being the originator of the site, there is a page showing me in a photo with my mother Pamela Firk, Angelie Delate (a friend) and a yoga teacher we interviewed for the site (Swami Satchidananda). It clearly states in the caption that I am the webmaster (they have removed the link to my bio page).
Original page:
http://www.vegetarianusa.com/feature_articles/yoga/swami_satchidanada.html
gototour.com clone...
http://www.gototour.com/feature_articles/yogalswami_satchidanada.html

If you go to their home page http://www.gototour.com, you can see they have cloned over 150 pages of my websiteVegetarianUSA.com. By clicking on the USA map (identical to the one on our VegetarianUSA.com home page), you can go to many state pages. To the left of the map are text links to cities within their site. Quite a few links cannot be found on the home page, as they are located only on pages within the site (i.e. feature articles, glossary, etc.). Please respond as to whether or not I have to send a complete list of urls from gototour.com that need to be removed from the Google search.

Their current contact information is:
Registrant:
Domains by Proxy, Inc. | DomainsByProxy.com
15111 N. Hayden Rd., Ste 160, PMB 353, Scottsdale, AZ 85260 United States

Registered through: GoDaddy.com, Inc. (http://www.godaddy.com)
Domain Name: GOTOTOUR.COM
Created on: 24-Nov-03
Expires on: 24-Nov-09
Last Updated on: 10-Apr-06

Administrative Contact:
Private, Registration GOTOTOUR.COM@domainsbyproxy.com
Domains by Proxy, Inc. | DomainsByProxy.com
15111 N. Hayden Rd., Ste 160, PMB 353, Scottsdale,AZ 85260 United States
(480) 624-2599

Domain servers in listed order:
NS1.SERVEPATH.COM
NS2.SERVEPATH.COM
ServePath, LLC
360 Spear Suite 200, San Francisco, CA 94105
415-869-7000

Note: Before going to private registration, they had the following false contact information: GoTo Tour (webmaster@gototour.com)
+ 1.123456789
Fax: + 1.123456789
35 Friars Road, Tomball, TX 77375
Creation date: 24 Nov 2003 23:25:20

I have a good faith belief that use of the copyrighted materials described above as allegedly infringing is not authorized by the copyright owner, its agent, or the law.

I swear, under penalty of perjury, that the information in the notification is accurate and that I am the copyright owner or am authorized to act on behalf of the owner of an exclusive right that is allegedly infringed.

I look forward to your timely response.


Sincerely Yours,
Peter E. Firk


Owner
The Vegetarian Travel Guide
http://www.vegetarianusa.com
